Text:
There seems to be a problem with the Launcher included in this torrent, to fix the problem uninstall all versions of Java on your computer and restart. Now install Java 7 from here: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre-7u2-download-1377135.html

32 Bit users use the 32 bit one (duh) and 64 bit users install BOTH the 32 AND the 64 bit one.

This will fix the cannot find main class error, and many other errors you may be having
